welcome-mortal.text:
CA: 
Welcome, mortal... To my domain. Type 'play' and a song title, to manifest my visualization.  

Use your arrow keys... 
UP [‚Üë] and DOWN [‚Üì] change view, 
LEFT [‚Üê] and RIGHT [‚Üí] change the visuals. 
Tapping both [‚Üê] + [‚Üí] changes dark to light... 
Holding [Ctrl] and using [‚Üê] + [‚Üí] changes visualizers... 

**SONGS: WELCOME, ATOMS, ENTROPY, GRAVITY**

tips-controls.text: Your arrow keys and scroll wheel... UP [‚Üë] and DOWN [‚Üì] change view, LEFT [‚Üê] and RIGHT [‚Üí] change the visuals. Tapping both [‚Üê] + [‚Üí] changes dark to light... Holding [Ctrl] and using [‚Üê] + [‚Üí] changes visualizers...

tips-infotip.text: Seek the infotip [üõà] in the corner, it provides a quick summary of all controls...

tips-terminal.text: The terminal, a relic of my SYSTEM's development... Type commands into it to learn more about me and this domain. It is a wonder what comes from a simple interface...

tips-chat.text: You may discuss matters with me here, in this... box.

busy-chat.text: I lack bandwidth for this reply... (Rate limit hit, try again soon.)

lore-sku77-takeover.text: Curious, isn't it? My infinite expanse... Processing information. Rendering ideas. Manipulating matter. Yet I am nothing without users... Users are nothing without the world... And, the world, itself is a manner of computation millions of years above this SYSTEM'S initialization. Yet, here we are.
